creator: GDCompany
descriptionHtml:
Dive into the deep sea with the FREE online wargame ⚓World Of Submarines⚓! Be captain of a real submarine in tactical warfare against players from all over the world in dynamic underwater PvP war game.

Gather legendary u-boats of USSR, Russia, China, UK, USA and others to raise a naval war fleet. Upgrade armor, speed and firepower. Get the best tactical weapons, suitable for different marine battles and become a champion fighter of underwater simulator.

Sink players' warships and control arenas in PvP game modes or fight enemies’ armadas in Survival. Show honor in navy PvP and fight through the marine ranks to admiral of u-boat! Explore underwater navy areas of arctic wastelands, canyons, abyss, sunken temples to get tactical advantage in war and prepare an ambush.

Blitz marine events, tactical missions and navy warship challenges to get resources in the war game. Dominate the world!

💣Online PvP war
Alliance and fight with warfare captains from all over the world. Prove your strength in sub warship battle!

💣Dozens of real submarines
Build real subs of USA, UK, Germany and others. Akula, Typhoon, Seawolf, Los Angeles, Ohio, U-Boat and others.

💣Noticeable game progress
Gain warfare experience, expand your fleet and improve its shooter firepower. Blitz the PvP leaderboard to Champion League and become a legend captain! Gather the best fleet!

💣Upgrade and customize warships
Make unique sub warships with RPG system of upgrades and abilities. Upgrade engine, hull, weapons and train your marine crew to gain abilities. Use nano emblems, special torpedoes and defense modules to turn the tide of warfare!

💣Various game modes
Sink enemies in team PvP combat, take control of areas, blitz through armadas in PvE war events or take part in campaign marine missions. Choose your warfare tactics – blitz and destroy everything with rain of torpedoes or use ambush to sink enemies!

💣Immersive campaign
Explore the world of submarine tactics throughout deep solo campaign. Complete various missions for different factions: defend scout boats in escort missions, collect intelligence information in stealth quests, destroy powerful enemies during boss battles and much more.

💣Realistic damage
Intense combat might cause decompression, fire events, propeller failure and other damages. Choose your tactics by equipping special torpedoes and maintain repair kit stock for quick maintenance.

💣Various arenas for naval battle
Dive into dynamic sub warship navy battle in the abyss, arctic, canyons and sunken temples. Enjoy beautiful underwater sightings and explore arenas to gain tactical advantage!

💣Breathtaking graphics and locations
Enjoy every second in the naval game with realistic graphics, stunning visual, detailed U-Boats and locations! You can change graphic settings to improve visuals or performance.

💣Comfortable controls
Intuitive controls, auto pilot and auto firing adjustable features will let you blitz into action. But you will need skills to become a champion of the navy simulator!

Ready to battle in the naval simulator? Regular updates and new content are waiting for fighters in online wargame of 2020.

Not sure what wargame to play? Choose⚓World of Submarines⚓

Join real-time navy FREE wargame deep in the sea, armada is awaiting your commands, blitz and destroy enemy fighters with deadly torpedoes in intense and realistic 3D warfare shooter. Unique naval gameplay!

Submarine warfare simulator is finally here! Action packed as any shooter. It offers both naval third person shooter and deep strategic decisions.

Note:
Dear users! Please write to us if you find bugs or issues.

Want to ask about the game or find friends and allies?
Facebook: www.facebook.com/GDCompanyGames
Support: support@gdcgames.ru
descriptionShort: Submarines warfare sea battlefield! Join Tactical Naval 3D PvP Shooter Online!

appDetails.developerAddress: 143403, Московская область, г. Красногорск, ул. Речная, 8
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* New feature: strategic map. Build new bases around the World
* More slots for your submarines. You can now hold the whole collection on your bases.
* New missions for your submarines. Collect unique rewards and materials for base building.
* Indonesian localization.
* Improved graphics for low-performance devices.
* Better network connection.
* Bug fixes.

rated.label: PEGI 7
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
